           i   f       (   t   y   p   e   o   f       C   S   M   R   e   q   s       !   =   =       '   u   n   d   e   f   i   n   e   d   '   )       {

                       i   f       (   C   S   M   R   e   q   s   .   h   a   s   O   w   n   P   r   o   p   e   r   t   y   (   '   c   f   '   )   )       {

                   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   d   e   c   l   a   r   a   t   i   v   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   c   t   i   o   n   =   "   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   c   a   c   h   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   f   a   l   s   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   w   i   d   t   h   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   4   8   0   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   n   a   m   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   s   w   f   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   u   r   l   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   d   p   P   o   p   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   p   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   k   T   .   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   d   =   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   a   =   t   a   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   t   =   s   h   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   h   e   a   d   e   r   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   S   h   a   r   e       t   h   i   s       i   t   e   m       v   i   a       E   m   a   i   l   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "   &gt;   
                                   a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   T   e   x   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   k   T   .   O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   k   T   .   O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                           a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   k   T   .   O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   k   T   .                                                    a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   k   T   .                                                    a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       T   w   i   t   t   e   r   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   t   w   _   d   p   _   k   T   .   O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   t   w   i   t   t   e   r   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   i   n   t   e   n   t   %   2   F   t   w   e   e   t   %   3   F   o   r   i   g   i   n   a   l   _   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   5   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   %   2   5   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   t   w   _   d   p   _   k   T   .   O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   %   2   6   t   e   x   t   %   3   D   P   s   y   c   h   o   -   C   y   b   e   r   n   e   t   i   c   s   %   2   5   2   C   %   2   5   2   0   A   %   2   5   2   0   N   e   w   %   2   5   2   0   W   a   y   %   2   5   2   0   t   o   %   2   5   2   0   G   e   t   %   2   5   2   0   M   o   r   e   %   2   5   2   0   L   i   v   i   n   g   %   2   5   2   0   O   u   t   %   2   5   2   0   o   f   %   2   5   2   0   L   i   f   e   %   2   5   2   0   b   y   %   2   5   2   0   M   a   x   w   e   l   l   %   2   5   2   0   M   a   l   t   z   %   2   6   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   %   3   D   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   5   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   %   2   6   u   r   l   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   t   w   _   d   p   _   k   T   .                                                    a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   5   7   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   P   i   n       i   t       o   n       P   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   k   T   .   O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   p   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   p   i   n   %   2   F   c   r   e   a   t   e   %   2   F   b   u   t   t   o   n   %   3   F   u   r   l   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   k   T   . O   v   b   1   Z   6   9   T   W   Z   %   2   6   m   e   d   i   a   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   e   c   x   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   i   m   a   g   e   s   %   2   5   2   F   I   %   2   5   2   F   5   1   2   J   6   i   C   S   6   K   L   .   j   p   g   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   o   k   e   n   =   9   F   5   8   B   3   6   6   2   5   8   E   1   A   8   B   5   2   5   9   E   9   B   E   F   3   4   8   2   E   0   2   3   4   1   F   4   2   D   3   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   =   "   P   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n   -   a   l   t   "   &gt;   P   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                                   
                   
   
                       
   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   
   P   .   w   h   e   n   (   "   A   "   ,   "   j   Q   u   e   r   y   "   )   .   e   x   e   c   u   t   e   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   A   ,   $   )       {   
           v   a   r       t   a   f       =       $   (   "   #   t   e   l   l   -   a   -   f   r   i   e   n   d   "   )   ;

   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   s   t   a   c   k   "   &gt;   
                   s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   p   r   i   m   a   r   y       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   c   o   n   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   c   a   r   t   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   i   n   p   u   t       i   d   =   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   o   v   e   r   =   "   S   e   l   e   c   t       &amp;l   t   ;   b   &amp;g   t   ;   _   _   d   i   m   s   _   _   &amp;l   t   ;   /   b   &amp;g   t   ;       f   r   o   m       t   h   e       l   e   f   t   &amp;l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;g   t   ;       t   o       a   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   p   u   t   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   "       v   a   l   u   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       C   a   r   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   l   e   d   b   y   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   a   n   n   o   u   n   c   e   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   a   n   n   o   u   n   c   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   t   e   x   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   h   i   d   d   e   n   =   "   t   r   u   e   "   &gt;            }

   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       F   T   _   g   e   t   C   o   u   n   t   d   o   w   n   (   s   e   c   o   n   d   s   L   e   f   t   )

           v   a   r       F   T   _   c   u   r   r   e   n   t   T   i   m   e       =       n   e   w       D   a   t   e   (   )   ;

   	   	   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   i   m   a   g   e   B   l   o   c   k   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   r   o   w   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   h   e   i   g   h   t   :   3   8   6   .   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   7   p   x   ;   "   &gt;   
   
   	   	   	   
   
   
   
   
   
   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   i   m   a   g   e   B   l   o   c   k   C   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   r   o   w       a   -   g   r   i   d   -   v   e   r   t   i   c   a   l   -   a   l   i   g   n       a   -   g   r   i   d   -   c   e   n   t   e   r       m   a   i   n   t   a   i   n   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   h   e   i   g   h   t   :   3   4   6   .   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   6   7   p   x   ;   "   &gt;

   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   
                   v   a   r       i   n   s   e   r   t   C   e   n   t   e   r   C   o   l   S   t   y   l   e       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   w   i   d   t   h   )       {

  b   [   s   ]   |   |   (   b   [   s   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   m   i   d   )   ;   b   [   t   ]   |   |   (   b   [   t   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   s   i   d   )   ;   b   [   f   ]   |   |   (   b   [   f   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   i   d   )   ;   a   =   "   /   /   "   +   c   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   +   "   /   1   /   "   +   a   [   u   ]   +   "   /   1   /   O   P   /   "   +   a   [   v   ]   +   "   /   "   +   a   [   w   ]   +   "   /   "   +   l   (   [   a   ]   ,   x   )   ;   i   f   (   k   )   t   r   y   {   k   .   c   a   l   l   (   d   [   n   ]   ,   a   )   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   g   )   {   c   .   u   e   .   s   b   f   =   1   ,   (   n   e   w       I   m   a   g   e   )   .   s   r   c   =   a   }   e   l   s   e   (   n   e   w       I   m   a   g   e   )   .   s   r   c   =   
   a   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       p   (   )   {   g   &amp;&amp;g   .   i   s   S   t   u   b   &amp;&amp;g   .   r   e   p   l   a   y   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   ,   b   ,   c   )   {   a   =   a   [   0   ]   ;   b   =   a   [   h   ]   =   a   [   h   ]   |   |   {   }   ;   b   [   f   ]   =   b   [   f   ]   |   |   c   ;   r   (   a   )   }   )   ;   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   =   r   ;   g   =   n   u   l   l   }   i   f   (   !    A   )   }   )   ,   A   =   q   (   "   ,   "   ,   "   @   "   ,   "   |   "   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   .   i   d   }   )   ,   g   =   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   ;   y   &amp;&amp;u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   (   {   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   :   "   c   s   m   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   a   :   [   {   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   N   a   m   e   :   "   c   s   m   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   s   "   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   :   [   {   i   d   :   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   -   t   r   a   c   k   i   n   g   "   }   ]   }   ]   ,   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   :   {   c   s   m   :   1   }   ,   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   -   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   s   "   }   )   ;   k   ?   p   (   )   :   (   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   ,   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   b   e   f   o   r   e   u   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   )   ;   d   .                    }   
           }

                                   d   i   v       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   c   a   r   o   u   s   e   l   -   o   p   t   i   o   n   s   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   a   j   a   x   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;            a   m   z   n   J   Q   .   o   n   R   e   a   d   y   (   '   a   c   r   P   o   p   o   v   e   r   '   ,       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )       {   
                   j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   '   .   a   c   r   -   p   o   p   o   v   e   r   ,   #   s   e   a   r   c   h   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e       .   a   s   i   n   R   e   v   i   e   w   s   S   u   m   m   a   r   y   '   )   .   e   a   c   h   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )       {   
                           i   f       (   t   y   p   e   o   f       j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   t   h   i   s   )   .   a   c   r   P   o   p   o   v   e   r       =   =   =       '   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   '   )       {

                           }   
                   }   )   ;   
           }   )   ;   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   c   r   A   v   g   S   t   a   r   s   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   w   h   i   t   e   -   s   p   a   c   e   :   n   o   -   w   r   a   p   ;   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   s   i   n   R   e   v   i   e   w   s   S   u   m   m   a   r   y       a   c   r   -   p   o   p   o   v   e   r   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   "       r   e   f   =   "   d   p   _   d   b   _   c   m   _   c   r   _   a   c   r   _   p   o   p   _   "       &gt;   
                                                       a       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   c   u   r   s   o   r   :   p   o   i   n   t   e   r   ;   t   e   x   t   -   d   e   c   o   r   a   t   i   o   n   :   n   o   n   e   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   P   s   y   c   h   o   -   C   y   b   e   r   n   e   t   i   c   s   -   N   e   w   -   M   o   r   e   -   L   i   v   i   n   g   -   L   i   f   e   /   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   -   r   e   v   i   e   w   s   /   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   /   r   e   f   =   d   p   _   d   b   _   c   m   _   c   r   _   a   c   r   _   i   m   g   /   1   7   5   -   5   2   8   7   0   4   0   -   7   3   6   4   7   2   3   ?                                            s   t   y   l   e   =   "   m   a   r   g   i   n   -   l   e   f   t   :   -   3   p   x   "   &gt;   a       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   -   d   e   c   o   r   a   t   i   o   n   :   n   o   n   e   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   P   s   y   c   h   o   -   C   y   b   e   r   n   e   t   i   c   s   -   N   e   w   -   M   o   r   e   -   L   i   v   i   n   g   -   L   i   f   e   /   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   -   r   e   v   i   e   w   s   /   0   6   7   1   7   0   0   7   5   8   /   r   e   f   =   d   p   _   d   b   _   c   m   _   c   r   _   a   c   r   _   i   m   g   /   1   7   5   -   5   2   8   7   0   4   0   -   7   3   6   4   7   2   3   ?                                    h   2       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   b   a   s   e   "   &gt;   W   h   a   t       O   t   h   e   r       I   t   e   m   s       D   o       C   u   s   t   o   m   e   r   s       B   u   y       A   f   t   e   r       V   i   e   w   i   n   g       T   h   i   s       I   t   e   m   ?   /   h   2   &gt;
